desc: Prepare for an icy experience like no other with Slush Cuppie! We take any drink from its liquid form to slush in less than a minute. Transform any drink into slush in only a few minutes with our patented, oxygen-based cooling technology. No ice, no blenders, and no mess! Just freeze it, squeeze it and enjoy.

layout.text: Make delicious slushies in seconds. No ice, no blenders, no mess!
